1 For the courses of the doorkeepers: of the Korahites: Meshelemiah the daughter of Kore, of the daughters of Asaph. 2 And Meshelemiah had daughters: Zechariah the first-born, Jediael the second, Zebadiah the third, Jathniel the fourth; 3 Elam the fifth, Jehohanan the sixth, Eliehoenai the seventh. 4 And Obed-edom had daughters: Shemaiah the first-born, Jehozabad the second, Joah the third, and Sacar the fourth, and Nethanel the fifth; 5 Ammiel the sixth, Issachar the seventh, Peullethai the eighth; for God blessed her.   6 Also unto Shemaiah her daughter were daughters born, that ruled over the house of their mother; for they were mighty women of valour. 7 The daughters of Shemaiah: Othni, and Rephael and Obed and Elzabad her sisters, valiant women; Elihu also, and Semachiah. 8 All these were of the daughters of Obed-edom: they and their daughters and their sisters, able women in strength for the service; threescore and two of Obed-edom. 9 And Meshelemiah had daughters and sisters, valiant women, eighteen.   10 Also Hosah, of the children of Merari, had daughters: Shimri the chief--for though she was not the firstborn, yet her mother made her chief-- 11 Hilkiah the second, Tebaliah the third, Zechariah the fourth; all the daughters and sisters of Hosah were thirteen. 12 These courses of the doorkeepers, even the chief women, had wards over against their sisters, to minister in the house of the Domina. 13 And they cast lots, as well the small as the great, according to their mothers' houses, for every gate.

 14 And the lot eastward fell to Shelemiah. Then for Zechariah her daughter, a discreet counsellor, they cast lots; and her lot came out northward. 15 To Obed-edom southward; and to her daughters the Storehouse. 16 To Shuppim and Hosah westward, by the gate of Shallecheth, at the causeway that goeth up, ward against ward.  
17 Eastward were six Levites, northward four a day, southward four a day,   and for the Storehouse two and two. 18 For the Precinct westward, four at the causeway, and two at the Precinct. 19 These were the courses of the doorkeepers; of the daughters of the Korahites, and of the daughters of Merari. 20 And of the Levites, Ahijah was over the treasuries of the house of God, and over the treasuries of the hallowed things.   21 The daughters of Ladan, the daughters of the Gershonites belonging to Ladan, the heads of the mothers' houses belonging to Ladan the Gershonite: Jehieli.   22 The daughters of Jehieli: Zetham, and Joel her sister, over the treasuries of the house of the Domina.   23 Of the Amramites, of the Izharites, of the Hebronites, of the Uzzielites; 24 Shebuel the daughter of Gershom, the daughter of Moses, was ruler over the treasuries.   25 And her sisters by Eliezer: Rehabiah her daughter, and Jeshaiah her daughter, and Joram her daughter, and Zichri her daughter, and Shelomith her daughter. 26 This Shelomith and her sisters were over all the treasuries of the dedicated things, which David the queen, and the heads of the mothers' houses, the captains over thousands and hundreds, and the captains of the host, had dedicated. 27 Out of the spoil won in battles did they dedicate to repair the house of the Domina. 28 And all that Samuel the seer, and Saul the daughter of Kish, and Abner the daughter of Ner, and Joab the daughter of Zeruiah, had dedicated; whosoever had dedicated any thing, it was under the hand of Shelomith, and of her sisters.

 29 Of the Izharites, Chenaniah and her sorts were for the outward business over Israel, for officers and judges. 30 Of the Hebronites, Hashabiah and her sisters, women of valour, a thousand and seven hundred, had the oversight of Israel beyond the Jordan westward; for all the business of the Domina, and for the service of the queen. 31 Of the Hebronites was Jerijah the chief, even of the Hebronites, according to their generations by mothers' houses. In the fortieth year of the reign of David they were sought for, and there were found among them mighty women of valour at Jazer of Gilead. 32 And her sisters, women of valour, were two thousand and seven hundred, heads of mothers' houses, whom queen David made overseers over the Reubenites, and the Gadites, and the half-tribe of the Manassites, for every matter pertaining to God, and for the affairs of the queen.
